code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{motion}from"framer-motion";import{Github,ExternalLink,Folder}from"lucide-react";import"./ProjectCard.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProjectCard=_ref=>{let{project}=_ref;const{title,shortDescription,technologies=[],githubUrl,demoUrl,category}=project;const categoryIcons={web:"üíº",mobile:"üì±",desktop:"üñ•Ô∏è",other:"üìÅ"};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{className:"project-card",whileHover:{y:-8},transition:{duration:0.3},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-icon",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Folder,{size:32}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"category-badge",children:categoryIcons[category]||"üìÅ"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"project-title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"project-description",children:shortDescription}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-technologies",children:[technologies.slice(0,4).map((tech,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"tech-tag",children:tech},index)),technologies.length>4&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"tech-tag more",children:["+",technologies.length-4]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-links",children:[githubUrl&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:githubUrl,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"project-link","aria-label":"View source code",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Github,{size:20})}),demoUrl&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:demoUrl,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"project-link","aria-label":"View live demo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExternalLink,{size:20})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/projects/".concat(project.id),className:"project-link","aria-label":"View project details",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExternalLink,{size:20})})]})]});};export default ProjectCard;
